title: 11/07: Start or Sit (AFC); Schedule Talk (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We start the show with a bunch of players with good schedules (2:00) and bad schedules (6:15) going forward. You might want to get Jameis Winston on your team! What do we think about the schedules for Josh Allen, Mark Ingram and more? ... Our Tullamore Dew Players of the Week (12:10) are some sneaky guys who could surprise you in Week 10. And we give you some Week 10 stats to know (15:45) and have our Sixty-Second Rankings Disputes (16:50) on Sammy Watkins, Jamison Crowder, Emmanuel Sanders and more. Plus the big news (26:15) as we discuss some players you may have to drop and "Start, Sit, or Flex at Best" (32:30) for players we are covering late in the show like Odell Beckham Jr., Devin Singletary and Kalen Ballage ... LAR-PIT (35:00), KC-TEN (46:00), NYG-NYJ (55:00), BUF-CLE (1:02:00), BAL-CIN (1:06:00), MIA-IND (1:10:15) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Odell Beckham, Devin Singletary, Damien Williams, Kareem Hunt, Jared Goff, Juju Smith-Schuster and more players you may have questions about as we discuss the six AFC home games.
